recipesJson.name: Platinum Blue | DEVELOPED
recipesJson.author: Developed
recipesJson.description:
This is a collaborative creation by DEVELOPED: NaChef, Max Savage, Graham, and Folkart.
Yes, we did it!  We took the concept of our Platinum Blush and made it BLUE!  Full flavor notes on DEVELOPED Episode 41 at https://youtu.be/jIPpL0hlnhg .

Our weekly episodes are released at 6:00pm EST every Tuesday, and catch our live shows every Thursday at 6pm EST.
 
Check out our website at https://www.DevelopedDIY.com

Find us on YouTube https://www.youtube.com/c/DevelopedDIY
 
Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/developeddiy/

Check out our FaceBook Page at https://www.facebook.com/developeddiy/

reviews.text: This is a very well balanced recipe . The Blueberry works perfectly and is very subtle and not overpowering . I agree with another comment that it needs a longer steep than Platinum Blush . I find it best when close to 2 weeks steeping . I really like this recipe . Keep up the great work guys .

This needs more time than platinum blush to come together and that recipe is so good. At 10 days, this recipe is very good. The blueberry is not as prominent as the strawberry in the other recipe. Overall, I prefer platinum blush but this is nice to have in rotation.
